name: Baguette Banish
description:
The Baguette Monsters have taken over the world, moon and even candy-land. Will you be able to save the planets and defeat the baguette men?

This game is a first person shooter with modern, state of the art baguette weapons used for combat.

This is one of my very first games so don't judge it *too much*, if you have any feedback on what I could do to make it better please leave a comment, any feedback would be greatly appreciated. Hope you enjoy it!!
